channel.title: How do i place enemies and items on the map
channel.description: i dont know whatm the enemy id's are and idk how to place them in the game.

item.title: How do i place enemies and items on the map
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Typically, this is how servers have their autospawn.cfg files configured:
//spawn = npcId xCoord yCoord heightLevel walkType maxHit attack defence npcDescription

Read full topic
item.source: How do i place enemies and items on the map

item.title: How do i place enemies and items on the map
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

actually i just found out it is the Autospawn.cfg file but the thing is that my Autospawn.cfg file is completely empty so idk how to do this.

item.source: How do i place enemies and items on the map

item.title: How do i place enemies and items on the map
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Enemies? I’m going to assume you mean NPCs. How you spawn NPCs dependent on your source, which you failed to include within the OP.

Check in your src>data>cfg though. npc_location or something of the sorts would be the most appropriate file name to check.

Read full topic
